Query.Name: CountOpnTypes
ParmListAll
ParmListReal
Query.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW ParmTableDefn.OpnTypID, ParmData.Occur, ParmDefn.ID AS ParmID, ParmTableDefn.ID AS [TableID], ParmData.SegID, CSng([Value]) AS Rval FROM (ParmTableDefn INNER JOIN ParmDefn ON ParmTableDefn.ID = ParmDefn.ParmTableID) INNER JOIN ParmData ON ParmDefn.ID = ParmData.ParmID WHERE (((IsNumeric([value]))=True) AND ((ParmDefn.ParmTypeID)=3)) ORDER BY ParmDefn.ID;

Query.Name: ParmListRealSummary
Query.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW ParmListReal.OpnTypID, OpnTypDefn.Name AS Operation, ParmListReal.TableID, ParmTableDefn.Name AS [Table], ParmListReal.ParmID, ParmDefn.Name AS Parameter, Count(ParmListReal.ParmID) AS [Count], Avg(ParmListReal.Rval) AS [Avg], ParmDefn.Min AS GloMin, ParmDefn.Max AS GloMax, ParmDefn.Def, Min(ParmListReal.Rval) AS [Min], Max(ParmListReal.Rval) AS [Max], StDev(ParmListReal.Rval) AS StDev FROM ScenarioData INNER JOIN (ParmTableDefn INNER JOIN ((OpnTypDefn INNER JOIN (ParmListReal INNER JOIN ParmDefn ON ParmListReal.ParmID = ParmDefn.ID) ON OpnTypDefn.ID = ParmListReal.OpnTypID) INNER JOIN SegData ON ParmListReal.SegID = SegData.ID) ON ParmTableDefn.ID = ParmDefn.ParmTableID) ON ScenarioData.ID = SegData.ScenarioID GROUP BY ParmListReal.OpnTypID, OpnTypDefn.Name, ParmListReal.TableID, ParmTableDefn.Name, ParmListReal.ParmID, ParmDefn.Name, ParmDefn.Min, ParmDefn.Max, ParmDefn.Def, ScenarioData.UCIUnits HAVING (((ScenarioData.UCIUnits)=1)) ORDER BY ParmListReal.ParmID;

Query.Name: ParmTableAliasAvailable
Query.SQL: UPDATE DISTINCTROW TableAliasDefn INNER JOIN ParmTableDefn ON (TableAliasDefn.Name = ParmTableDefn.Name) AND (TableAliasDefn.OpnTypID = ParmTableDefn.OpnTypID) SET ParmTableDefn.Alias = Yes;

Query.Name: ParmTableData
Query.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW SegData.ID AS SegID, ParmDefn.Name, ParmData.Value, ParmDefn.ID AS ParmID, ParmDefn.AssocID AS AssocID, ParmDefn.ParmTableID AS TabID, ParmTableDefn.OpnTypID, ParmTableDefn.Name AS [Table], ParmData.Occur, IIf([ParmTableDefn]![Alias]=0,' ','Alias') AS AliasInfo FROM (ScenarioData INNER JOIN SegData ON ScenarioData.ID = SegData.ScenarioID) INNER JOIN ((ParmTableDefn INNER JOIN ParmDefn ON ParmTableDefn.ID = ParmDefn.ParmTableID) INNER JOIN ParmData ON ParmDefn.ID = ParmData.ParmID) ON SegData.ID = ParmData.SegID;

Query.Name: ParmTableList
ScenTableList
Query.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW SegData.ID AS SegID, ParmTableDefn.Name, ParmTableDefn.ID AS TabID, ParmTableDefn.OpnTypID FROM (ScenarioData INNER JOIN SegData ON ScenarioData.ID = SegData.ScenarioID) INNER JOIN ((ParmTableDefn INNER JOIN ParmDefn ON ParmTableDefn.ID = ParmDefn.ParmTableID) INNER JOIN ParmData ON ParmDefn.ID = ParmData.ParmID) ON SegData.ID = ParmData.SegID;

Query.Name: UniqueName
Query.SQL: SELECT DISTINCTROW OpnTypDefn.Name AS OpnType, ParmDefn.Name AS ParmName, ParmData.Value FROM (TableAliasDefn INNER JOIN (ParmDefn INNER JOIN ParmData ON ParmDefn.ID = ParmData.ParmID) ON TableAliasDefn.IDVar = ParmDefn.ID) INNER JOIN OpnTypDefn ON TableAliasDefn.OpnTypID = OpnTypDefn.ID GROUP BY TableAliasDefn.OpnTypID, OpnTypDefn.Name, ParmDefn.Name, ParmData.Value, TableAliasDefn.IDVar ORDER BY TableAliasDefn.OpnTypID, ParmDefn.Name, ParmData.Value;
